definitions.definition: A relationship of resemblance or equivalence between two situations, people, or objects, especially when used as a basis for explanation or extrapolation .
The proportion or the equality of ratios .

The correspondence of a word or phrase with the genius of a language , as learned from the manner in which its words and phrases are ordinarily formed; similarity of derivative or inflectional processes.

main_definition: A relationship of resemblance or equivalence between two situations, people, or objects, especially when used as a basis for explanation or extrapolation .
secondary_definitions: ( geometry ) The proportion or the equality of ratios .

( grammar ) The correspondence of a word or phrase with the genius of a language , as learned from the manner in which its words and phrases are ordinarily formed; similarity of derivative or inflectional processes.
